actions.text: Amendment (A020) offered by Ms. Sanchez, Loretta.
On agreeing to the Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 237 (Roll no. 331).

description: Amendment sought to reduce the Department of Energy's departmental administration account by $16,000,000, and increase funding for the National Nuclear Security Administration's defense nonproliferation program by $16,000,000.
purpose: An amendment to reduce the Department of Energy's departmental administration account by $16,000,000, and increase the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation account by $16,000,000.
